Name: U22
Description: CGV U22 is a CGV membership program for customers who are from 12 to 22 years old

Name: CGV Member
Description: CGV membership is a point-base membership program carter to frequent customers from 23 years old of CGV

Name: CGV VIP
Description: Customers whose total spending last year was from 5,500,000VND to under 10,000,000VND will become CGV VIP this year

Name: CGV VVIP
Description: Customers whose total spending last year is from 10,000,000VND and above will become CGV VVIP this year
